mapper.select: select * from MEET_CATEGORY order by meet_ctgnum asc
select meet_memid from MEET_INFO where meet_listnum = #{meet_listnum} order by meet_memid desc
select nvl(max(meet_review_num),0) + 1 from meet_review where meet_listnum = #(meet_listnum)
mapper.insert: insert into MEET_REVIEW (meet_listnum, meet_review_num, meet_memid, meet_review_content, meet_review_date, meet_review_img) values (#{meet_listnum}, #{meet_review_num}, #{meet_memid}, #{meet_review_content}, #{meet_review_date}, #{meet_review_img})
